evidence.text: On August 24, 2022, the Court issued a decision granting the United States’ motion for a preliminary injunction (Dkt. 95).

extracted.value: On August 24, 2022, the Court issued a decision granting the United States’ motion for a preliminary injunction (Dkt. 95).

evidence.text: The Court will deny the motion to reconsider

extracted.value: The Court will deny the State and Legislature’s motion to reconsider their preliminary injunction order.

evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction Lisa Newman appearing for Plaintiff United States of America. Responses due by 8/29/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support, # 2 Proposed Order,

extracted.value: Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by Lisa Newman on behalf of the United States; requested a preliminary injunction; responses due August 29, 2022.

evidence.text: MOTION to Expedite Idaho Legislatures Motion to Intervene Daniel W. Bower appearing for Intervenor Defendant Speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives Scott Bedke, Idaho Senate President Pro Tempore Chuck Winder, and the Sixty-Sixth Idaho Legislature. Responses due by 8/29/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support of Motion to Intervene, # 2 Exhibit 1 Proposed Answer)

extracted.value: Expedited Motion to Intervene filed by Daniel Bower, representing the State of Idaho; requested intervention in the case; responses due August 29, 2022.
